exceptions.exn: In environment n'' : nat IH : let (p, b) := div2 (S n'') in if b then S n'' = 2 * p + 1 else S n'' = 2 * p p : nat Hdiv : div2 n'' = (p, One) Unable to unify "S (S (p + S (p + 0) + 0))" with "S (S n'')".
[Focus] Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.
In environment n'' : nat IH : let (p, b) := div2 (S n'') in if b then S n'' = 2 * p + 1 else S n'' = 2 * p p : nat Hdiv : div2 n'' = (p, Zero) Unable to unify "S (p + S (p + 0))" with "S (S n'')".

original: induction n as [| n' IH]. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct n' as [| n'']. -- simpl. reflexivity. -- simpl. destruct (div2 n'') as [p b] eqn:Hdiv. destruct b. ++ simpl. rewrite Nat.add_succ_r. reflexivity. ++ simpl. reflexivity.
